snippet: Six Americans were among the dead after a car packed with explosives shook the relative calm that had prevailed for months in the Afghan capital.
abstract: Toyota Corolla packed with explosives rams pair of American military vehicles in Kabul, Afghanistan, setting off blast that kills at least 16 people, including 6 American military advisers; blast, which also wounds more than three dozen Afghans, shakes relative calm that has prevailed for months in city; small insurgent faction Hezb-i-Islami claims responsibility for attack.

byline.original: By MATTHEW ROSENBERG and SANGAR RAHIMI

lead_paragraph: Six Americans were among the dead after a car packed with explosives shook the relative calm that had prevailed for months in the Afghan capital.

headline.seo: Deadly Attack on U.S. Military Vehicles in Kabul
headline.main: Attack on U.S. Military Vehicles Kills at Least 16 in Kabul
headline.print_headline: Strong Blast In Kabul Hits U.S. Vehicles And Kills 16

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
